mean_en: something that encourages you to do something; a payment or concession (= a reduction in the amount of money that has to be paid) that encourages somebody to do something
sentence: The carrot serves as an incentive to drive the horse.
word_etyma: in向内，进入 + cent唱歌 + ive名词后缀 → 把精神唱进去 → incentive激励
